version_description:
WHAT’S NEW:
It’s time to Chuck stuff up! New Yellow Event
Endless Player Level: New endless levels added after level 30! Each level up comes with a chest full of gold or gems.
Different Fusion types now have separate functions and info!
PvP ti

- Prepare your posterior for PvP two point oh. Fight for trophies and show your opponents who’s boss.
- Add a little Bomb to your squad. His explosiveness, BOMB, is available as a for a limited time only.
- Share 360 screenshots on Facebook. Welcome

This is a BIG one. For a limited time, you have a chance to add beefy bird Terence to your flock. Oh yeah, and Matilda too. Both are 5 star birds – a welcome addition to any team.
Other new stuff:
– iMessage stickers. Evolve your iMessage game with

This is a BIG one. For a limited time, you have a chance to add beefy bird Terence to your flock. Oh yeah, and Matilda too. Both are 5 star birds – a welcome addition to any team.
Other new stuff:
– iMessage stickers. Evolve your iMessage game with

Watch the skies! We’re preparing for an extra special event, and some extraterrestrial visitors. Participate in the Alien Abduction event for a chance to add one of these angry aliens to your team.
Other new stuff:
– Visual improvements
– Added h

We've evolved the game even further. As in, improved in lots of places. Including things like:
– Updated the bird Evolution steps
– Added quests
– Fixed scout markers
– Plus other fixes, optimizations and improvements yo
Out now globally!

It’s America first on July 4th for a huge Independence Day event. For a limited time, we want YOU to have a chance to add mega-patriotic five-star bird, Captain Freedom, to your flock. Hatch those eggs and set the captain free!
– Hatch Captain Freedom
Angry Birds Evolution evolves, one bug fix at a time.

Mighty Eagle has opened up his mountain and it is a bargain! Climb up to get a 5 STAR LEVEL 100 EGG
That's right, the ultimate eggs!
- NEW feature: Eagle Mountain
- NEW PvP divisions, more the merrier!
- NEW Dr. Probotnik iMessage Sticker
-

- Diamond and Champion Leagues now award Prestige Totems for high rankings again (more than before)
- All-time-highscore trophy rewards increased to 15.000
- Captain Freedom's super shot power has been increased, he is now in line with other white 5

Angry Birds Evolution gets faster, better, and angrier with some major improvements.

-A brand new feature from Major Packer: Daily Challenges!
Engage in battles and try to survive as long as possible, earn Snouts to unlock rewards for your

Angry Birds Evolution gets faster, better, and angrier with some major improvements.

-A brand new feature from Major Packer: Daily Challenges!
Engage in battles and try to survive as long as possible, earn Snouts to unlock rewards for your

Two worlds collide in our tribute to metal gods, IRON MAIDEN! This Halloween, Iron Maiden mascot, Eddie has come to Angry Birds Evolution to harvest piggy souls. For a limited time, all players have a chance to hatch Eddie the Bird from golden eggs. Welco

This Thanksgiving, get an extra helping of Cold Turkey. Destined for Don Bacon’s dinner table, Cold Turkey escaped and now he’s determined to exact his revenge. Put this five-star fowl on your team and take down the Don. Revenge is a dish best served cold

Christmas is on its way and the pigs at Bacon Corp are up to no good! Their latest energy drink, Cinnamon Chaoz is messing up the entire Bird Island. Luckily we've dispatched two brand new birds to save Christmas!

Check out the full notes: http://r

Nothing says easter like eggs. Crack open some eggs in the Hatchery for a chance to welcome hothead Bomb back to the fold. Also, beware of Miffi (AKA The Harbinger of Doom) who is coming for your SOUL – and your Easter chocolates. Last, we made some impro

Bird Island has been tuned into the NFL season thanks to some tinkering from Dr. Strangebird. Now the whole island is hyped up for Super Bowl LII! Join the celebration to collect a brand new bird – The Quarterback, and hit the gridiron for a game of Pigba
Angry Birds Evolution gets faster, better, and angrier with some minor improvements.

Nothing says easter like eggs. Crack open some eggs in the Hatchery for a chance to welcome hothead Bomb back to the fold. Also, beware of Miffi (AKA The Harbinger of Doom) who is coming for your SOUL – and your Easter chocolates. Last, we made some impro

Skate to where the flock is going to be in a hockeytastic update featuring two new birds and no shortage of bench-clearing brawls. Hatch five-star Ricky "The Red Menace" Redsky and earn awesome rewards for yourself and your clan – if you can make it to th

Welcome a boss new 5-star bird, El Jefe, to your flock in a Cinco de Mayo celebration unlike any other. Hasta la vista, piggies!
Read the full patch notes: https://rov.io/evo118

You’ve got a VIP ticket to Flockabalooza, the world’s first mobile music festival! After the gates open on May 30, you have a chance to hatch three five-star headliners: DEDSW1N3, Lady Bacon, and Li'l Pecker. Get ready for two weeks of love, feathers, and

Grandfather Frost and blue birds now act as intended.
Black skill damage calculation fixed.
PvP pigs now disappear after KO.

We keep evolving the game, this time with our summer update!
– NEW: Event Island feature is here with it's own energy!
– NEW BIRD: Birdstiano Eagaldo, it's football fever!
– Multiple awesome events including EAGLE CUP!

New update, thank you for playing the game!
- An alien event with a new… bird?
- More events on the Event Island!

The flock returns with a new update! We're getting ready for a new (and Blue) event and adding a new way to take on daily challenges.
– Everton event coming soon!
– Hatch 3 new Birds based on Everton players.
– New Daily Challenge Trials.
– Re
